title: Launch your brand with lifetime premium web hosting through iBrave, now under $30
content:
Macworld

Need a gift for a loved one with a small business or emerging digital presence? Give them iBrave for an exceptional web hosting solution.

Now through November 16th, you can gift yourself or a loved one a lifetime of reliable and affordable cloud web hosting. Lifetime access to iBrave Professional is now only $29.97 (reg. $539)!

iBrave makes the onboarding process easy if your website is built on most major platforms — or even if you don’t have a site at all (though you must already own a domain elsewhere or are planning to purchase one). With a few clicks, you can migrate your site from WordPress, Joomla, or Magento, or start from scratch using the free website maker built into the system.

Once you’re in, your site is protected by state-of-the-art antivirus software and a spam blocker that keeps traffic humming along and ensures your website will be accessible to your visitors at all times.

You can add ten websites to your account and unlimited subdomains, and there’s no cap on monthly bandwidth or SSD storage. With free daily backups and a streamlined control panel, you can focus on putting out content or products and watch the hits roll in.

Give yourself or a loved one more affordable cloud hosting with lifetime access to iBrave Cloud Professional Web Hosting, now just $29.97 through November 16th at 11:59pm PT. No coupon necessary!
